project_name.justification: The text states: "...the Company is providing full details of the Soap Gulch copper project located in Silver Bow and Madison counties, Montana, USA."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first sentence: "Vancouver, B.C. – TheNewswire - September 25, 2024 – Bolt Metals Corp. (“Bolt” or the “Company”) (CSE: BOLT) ... is pleased to announce that further to its press release of June 17, 2024... the Company is providing full details of the Soap Gulch copper project..."

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer, Bolt Metals Corp., is identified in a quote: "'The acquisition of the Soap Gulch property provides the Bolt with another advanced and highly prospective copper asset in a tier-one mining jurisdiction,' remarked Branden Haynes, Bolt’s President and CEO."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text refers to the "acquisition of the Soap Gulch property" but does not specify the percentage of interest that was acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the project as a "copper project" and the headline reads "Bolt Metals Builds on Copper Project Holdings".

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text is about the correct project, Soap Gulch, but no article link was included in the source documents.

currency.justification: The article does not contain any financial details of the transaction, so no currency can be determined.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text does not provide any details about cash payments for the acquisition of the Soap Gulch project.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text does not provide any details about share payments for the acquisition of the Soap Gulch project.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text does not provide any details about a combined cash and share payment for the acquisition of the Soap Gulch project.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention a specific number of shares issued as part of the acquisition terms.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments.

issued_share_price.justification: The text does not mention an issue price for shares related to the acquisition.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention an exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not mention a monetary exploration commitment for the project.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the project details.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: "It is comprised of 216 Federal Unpatented Lode Claims and totals 4,320 acres."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: "It is comprised of 216 Federal Unpatented Lode Claims and totals 4,320 acres."

resource_size.justification: The text provides historic drill intercepts (e.g., '11.7m of 1.2% copper') but does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate with mass or volume units like tonnes or ounces.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: "Bolt Metals Corp. (“Bolt” or the “Company”) (CSE: BOLT)".
